channel.title: BOLT on ThirdAI
channel.description: Recent content in BOLT on ThirdAI

item.title: Training Bottlenecks: A Harsh Reality of AI Models
item.description: There is no silver bullet AI modality. Better predictions require a constant cycle of feature engineering, hyper-parameter tuning, training, and testing the resultant models. The most time-consuming stage of any AI-powered application pipeline is fine tuning, which often requires repeated iterations of network training to expose performance gains. Even with AutoML and Neural Architecture Search (NAS), engineering features and hammering out other task-specific pipelines in an AI system is unavoidable.

item.title: BOLT
item.description: BOLT engine provides an easy-to-use and efficient deep learning library powered by sparse coding.

item.title: Product Recommendation
item.description: The BOLT engine can train a 1.6-billion parameter model on a <$1,200 refurbished V3 Intel machine faster than four top-of-the-line Nvidia A100 GPUs.

item.title: Question Answering and Information Retrieval
item.description: Our BOLT engine obtains the speed and scalability of lexical search with the accuracy of the best deep learning approaches for question answering.

item.title: Sentiment Classification
item.description: Using BOLT to train sentiment classication models we see large gains in accuracy as well as reduction in training and inference times, drastically reducing end-to-end deployment costs.

item.title: Using the ThirdAI Library (Python)
item.description: If you’d like to try out the BOLT engine yourself, follow this guide.

item.title: Webinars
item.description: An archive of our live presentations.
